title: THE BANANA
subtitle: This vacation rental gives you an opportunity to enjoy awesome water views from the common areas
text:
The Banana is 800 square foot private home with kitchen, 1 bedrooms and 1 bath. Enter into this peaceful tropical feeling space from your private entry on ground level.

$110 per night +$60 cleaning fee and 5% Fl visitor tax

title: THE PLANTATION
subtitle: This vacation rental gives you an opportunity to enjoy awesome water views from the common areas
text:
The Plantation is a 1500 + square foot private home with kitchen, 2 bedrooms, queen sleeper sofa, and 1 large bath. Reading room, spacious living room with 65″ smart TV. Families welcome.

$135 per night + $75 cleaning fee and 5% Fl visitor tax

title: THE BUNGALOW
subtitle: Beautiful bayou sunsets can be seen from the large living room of this ground floor private bungalow
text:
This 900 sq. ft. bungalow 1 bedroom with a queen bed,1 bathroom, furnished kitchen and breakfast bar.Access to a covered deck with grill.

$120 per night +$75 cleaning fee and 5% Fl visitor tax

title: THE BIRD NEST
subtitle: Enjoy the bird’s eye view from this 1300 sq. ft. 2nd floor apartment
text:
Water views and majestic old oaks nearby give you the feel of being in a tree house.  1 bedroom, queen, 1 bathroom, fully furnished kitchen, dining area, and TV viewing area.A new walkout deck to grill and relax.

$110 per night + $65 cleaning fee and 5% Fl visitor tax

title: THE MAGNOLIA
subtitle: Located in Downtown Historic old Panama City
text:
Just bicycling distance from Panama City Marina to catch the sunset and marine traffic.5 minutes from historical St Andrew’s shops, restaurants and outdoor activities.  15 minutes from Panama City Beach. 4 guests, 1 bedroom, 1 bath.

$85 per night + $65 cleaning fee and 5% Fl visitor tax.

title: THE HERON COTTAGE
subtitle: Cozy, cheery Florida cottage home newly remodeled
text:
Fenced backyard.Walking distance from our Hideaway resort property.  2 queen bedrooms, plus a queen sleeper sofa, 2 bathrooms, a fully furnished kitchen, dining area.Enjoy views from 2 waterfront decks just a short walk from this home.

$120 per night + $75 cleaning fee and 5% Fl visitor tax
